hero.subtitle: Unlock the liquidity of your staked assets. Earn rewards while participating in DeFi. Secure, Efficient, and Transparent.

features.title: Why Choose Us
features.f1_desc: Receive liquid tokens instantly when you stake. Trade, lend, or use them across the DeFi ecosystem.
features.f2_desc: Rewards are automatically reinvested to maximize your yield through the power of compound interest.
features.f3_desc: Smart contracts audited by top-tier security firms. Non-custodial and transparent.
